short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fun little clicker game where you try to make as many blankets as possible

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In this fun little clicker game, you try and build up your business by making as many blankets as possible! Start off by manually making your blankets, but as your business expands, you can start automatically producing blankets with machines. Be careful though, you have a limited amount of space to house machines.

Once you have purchased every upgrade, you may begin the ultimate process: Prestiging. Prestiging will allow you to start your business over again, but with a prestige token. These tokens can be used to buy permanent upgrades to ensure that you build your business back even stronger than before!

Your progress will automatically save as you work your way through this fun way to pass the time. Good luck clicking your way to wealth!

I hope you enjoy the game, and if you find any bugs, have any suggestions, or other feedback, feel free to let me know.
